question.xref: DES s6, HC p102, KYTS p31
question.text: At a junction you see this signal. It means

explanation.text: The white light shows that trams must stop, but the green light shows that other vehicles may go if the way is clear. You may not live in an area where there are trams but you should still learn the signs. You never know when you may go to a town with trams.

answer.text: both trams and cars must stop
both trams and cars can continue
